case.state:
A little card game...
Interesting proposal.
Who knows what might pass?
Oh, hello Rhajat! I wasn't aware you were going to come here, too.

Let's commence the game
and throw caution to the winds,
just our clothes at stake.
These are satisfactory. I have no need for more.
If I swapped these, the quality of my hand would only be lower. Hardly a desirable result.
I'll keep what I have, thank you very much.

It would be hubris
to aim for more when you have
perfection at hand.

I have all I want,
why overreach out of greed?
Zero cards, this time.
Wait, it's my turn to switch already? Uhh, let's trade... all of them. Yes, five cards.

Dire circumstances
call for desperate measures:
I shall swap five cards.

Alarming prospects
If I keep any of this
I'll swap the whole hand.

My hand needs some growth
so dealer, I ask of you:
please grant me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ this time, dealer.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ will hopefully improve my hand.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should work. Probably. Maybe. I'm hardly a poker expert, after all.
I think I should be fine with ~Cards.text~ new ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
No haiku this time. Just ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you will.
Let me think... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.

To prevent my loss
sacrifices must be made
I'll exchange these ~cards.text~.
Oh, is it the next round already? Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, then.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~... I hope they are lucky.

In my time of need,
Seeking a better outcome
I require ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.

If I ask for ~cards.text~
will I survive one more round?
Only time will tell.
Just give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, dealer.

Back against the wall;
how many should I ask for?
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should work fine.
Although it may be unavoidable, I'd rather try to stay in the game as long as possible. ~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ should work towards that end.
Father is always telling me: ''Fortune favors the diligent, Mitama''. Looking at these cards, I don't think he's right at all...
I can hardly call myself a poker expert, but at the very least I know when I have good cards. How about you, ~player~?

Inspiration struck
a fleeting moment captured
in a paper's folds.

A haiku's maxim:
What's good, if brief, two times good;
if bad, not as much.

As a poet, it is my duty not only to write poems, but also to educate those who wish to enter the world of haiku. Watching someone who was a total inept be able to compose a truly moving poem is very satisfying.
It's hard to attain perfection in the first try, but these are pretty close.

Fortune smiles on me
and heaps her ample blessings
someone else will strip.
I must admit, I am getting quite caught up with the game. More enjoyable than playing for money, that's for sure.
Haiku poems might be short, but that doesn't mean crafting one is easy. Every word must be carefully considered!

Luck is on my side,
a divine intervention?
If so, I am blessed.
I may have lost my gloves, but I still have a couple of tricks under my sleeves...

Much have I labored,
much have I lost; these cards are
a welcome respite.
I could hardly call myself a combat medic if I couldn't handle a bit of pressure, could I?
I bet Soleil would have a great time flirting with all the girls here. I will probably invite her next time I come.
If Nina ever came here... she would probably faint, with all the men getting naked together...
It's not often that I find myself in the company of so many people... I miss the quiet, somewhat.
Tsk... I can't come up with anything...
Few things can compare to the joy of taking a midday nap. You should try it for yourselves.
It's unlikely that you can grasp perfection on your first try. That's why it's important to keep writing.
I better write down some of the haiku I have come up with. I always forget them otherwise...
It is not often that I have to settle for mediocrity.

Much like life itself
card games depend on one's hand
more than one's choices.
I prefer napping at my own room, but as long as I have my pillow with me, anywhere is fine. Once, I ended up sleeping at the prison, even.
These... could use some improvement. Alas, I don't have the chance to do so.

Just a pair of cards;
with no major surprises,
it will be enough.
Hmm... nothing to write home about. Or, at all.

Creating from aught;
that would be remarkable
were I capable...

Think you know my hand?
Everything I say could be
nothing but a bluff...
I tend to strive for perfection, but I find myself a bit pressed for time here...
Hmm... I hope Fortune plays nice this time.

How much is enough?
The answer to that question
is, hopefully, this.

Leaving all to fate;
what exhilarating ride!
I am but a fare.

We can't help but play
life itself, a game of cards:
winners and losers.
Fate can be quite tricky. It is immovable, but it can also be quite difficult to predict... Sometimes you don't know what will happen until the very moment it occurs.

One more step of this
inscrutable path I walk;
I shall not stumble.

I go for a walk
gray skies beyond my window
hoping for no rain.

Fate is against me,
yet seeing the ambiance, I
can't complain too much.

Must I always lose?
Although inexperienced,
I am not alone...
The more you write, the more proficient you become. Perhaps the same is true for strip poker...

Oh, how unlucky...
I may have to strip! Truly,
a tremendous loss.

Surge of misfortune
time for Mitama to think:
what should I strip next?
Just so that people know, I didn't bring my festal here. That means, if someone scraps their knee, or something like that, I'm not healing them.
*yawn* I'm a bit tired... maybe if I hadn't stayed up all night writing haiku... no, I can hardly miss my most productive moment of the day.

Most of what I write
is simply not good enough
and ends up scrapped.
Like this one poem. It doesn't even have the correct amount of syllables...
Back at the base, we share the chores, like cooking and such, among ourselves. Mother says it helps foster the bonds between us; I say it's really tiresome.
In addition to my poems, I also dabble in chigiri-e, an art form that consists in creating images with pieces of torn paper. Maybe I can find a use for these cards, after all...

People at the base keep waking me up all the time. It's always: ''Mitama, there are injured people that need your attention!''; ''Mitama, why are you asleep at midday?''; ''Mitama, don't snore at the war council!'' Sleep should be sacred!
Can I take a nap for a while? No? Oh well...
Yeah, my cards are just dreadful. So dreadful, in fact, that there's no point to even pretend they are not.
Hmm... the game would be pretty boring if I always won, wouldn't it? And besides, losing is hardly an unacceptable outcome...

Is this bad karma?
Perhaps I am too attached
to worldly desires.
We are all victims of fate. Some of us simply accept it.
As of late, Father has been pushing me to get archery lessons, ''so that I can defend myself properly''. Can't he see I'm busy napping?

This hand is a joke!
I can almost hear Father
laughing at my luck.

These cards are no good.
Unfortunate Mitama...
or fortunate you?
Now that I think about it, maybe I didn't have to take off my gloves. I could have left them on... and nothing else.
Well, someone will be happy with this.
Barring a miracle, it will be my turn next. Fortunately for me, I seem to attract miracles, so...

Armed with naught but faith
I await the foreordained;
a not so harsh fate.

A four of a kind?
What an unprecedented,
yet convenient turn!
Oh, me? I'm Mitama, haiku poet and dreamer... and combat healer, at least for the moment. It is nice to meet you all.

Two trucks, having sex.
Such passion, I can't withstand.
Two trucks, having sex.

Sleepin' in your bed
an imperceptible man.
Who you gonna call?

Free will is a myth.
Religion is but a farce.
We are naught but memes.

Think Three Houses rules?
How about a true good game?
Play Thracia instead.

Surreptitiously
I opened one more time the
refrigerator.
I'm pretty sure that's just cheating... why do you insist in prolonging the inevitable so much?
I must admit, I feel similarly attached to my writing implements. After using them for so long, my poems feel soulless if I write with anything else.
Oh, a gimmick? Well, since you two came to the game together, maybe you'll do the forfeit together, too?

Well, I don't keep a journal itself, but most of the haiku I write are about my experiences and feelings...
To pour your own soul
not to people, but paper
is it strange, truly?
Oh, sometimes I cook for the army when it's my turn to do so. I'm actually pretty skilled at it, if I say so myself.

Under the night sky
skyclad I find myself now.
Will you observe me?
Incidentally, by which manner did the rest of you arrive to this place? It was easy for me to go through the Dragon's Gate, but maybe it was more complicated for you.

What gorgeous image!
Our naked bodies compete
with the moon's allure.
The moon is beautiful tonight, isn't it? A lot of haiku have been composed under the influence of a moon like this one...

Soft grass grazes me,
nature and poet, as one;
a small but pure joy.

Sandals discarded
I stand pleasantly barefoot
smooth sand under me.
It's probably a good thing there are no familiar faces at this table. Imagine the awkwardness of the day after...

An intimate match;
maybe we'll be cozier
just the three of us.
I'll admit, it's a bit hard to focus on the cards next to such a performance...
A ladies-only table? I had hoped for some more variety...
Now that you can see all of me, I think it's only fair to show both sides. Which one do you prefer, hmm?

In terms of meter,
five, seven and then five more:
so a haiku goes.

In the moonlit night
a friendly competition
no losers in sight.

By drawing my gaze
at the same sky of my youth
I felt I was old.
I should write this down...
Wait, am I the only one here who doesn't shave down there? I wasn't aware I was in the minority in this regard.
Hmm... A secluded location like this... It gives this whole situation an air of mystery, don't you think?

So many weapons
but none of them are for me:
a staff, all I need.
Did you know about the weapon triangle? Apparently, some weapons have an advantage against others... but I can never remember exactly how it goes.

Sword and katana
side by side as companions;
reminder of home.
A library... strange place for a strip poker game. I wonder if they have haiku books...
The library back at the shrine was much more modest than this one. Hehe, I might even find a haiku book I haven't already read!
I wonder if I'll be able to stay here after the game for a while to read at my leisure. A week or so should suffice for some light reading.

This place is heaven to me:
No park or meadow
can compete with the allure
of paper and shelves.
With how many books and poems I have at my room, it somewhat resembles this place... although here everything is much more orderly, I must admit.
So, whose birthday is it? Any of yours? It's not my own birthday, that's for sure...
Wait, it is my birthday today! How did they know? Oh, there's even cake...

A traveler, I
am not; the rains of winter
I will see from home.
This line can cover any of the Good/Okay/Bad hand cases if it has a higher priority
This line can cover any of the Good/Okay/Bad hand cases if it has a higher priority
This line can cover any of the Good/Okay/Bad hand cases if it has a higher priority
Hmm? What is a communion, exactly? I have offered food to the gods, but it's usually sake, not wafers...
No, not really. My haiku are just poems, not religious teachings. After all, proselytism would hardly be welcome in a strip poker game.

Human beings often find themselves befell by catastrophes, or are simply left unsatisfied by their circumstances. If they could change their position, then obviously they would. It would be cruel to pretend otherwise.

I simply dedicate myself to what I find enjoyable: poetry. Is it truly so hard to comprehend?
Another poor soul
trapped by productivity
my heart weeps for you.

Do not confuse, Blake,
seclusion with loneliness;
I chose my few friends.
As of late, I have managed to be at ease both by myself and with other people.

A like-minded soul?
Trading both verses and clothes,
I shall play along.
W-wait... I have to t-take off m-my c-clothes? B-but the p-purity of a s-shrine m-maiden i-i-is s-sacred! Kyaaah! I c-can't do t-this!
Oh, it's my turn? After all this time, I was starting to feel sleepy...

Finally, my turn arrives.
I'd almost been turned
from active participant
to mere observer.

Once again, a choice:
my armor, stalwart bulwark
is the answer now.

Yet another loss;
this shrine maiden will soon be
just a nude maiden.
My turn again? Perhaps if I had inherited some of my mother's strategical prowess, I wouldn't find myself in this position. Then again, it probably doesn't translate well to cards...
Hmm... next is my bra. Were you waiting for this, perhaps?
Me? Hmm... what should I reveal first?
My turn? I'll give you three guesses as to what I will take off. The first two don't count.
It might be a bit strange to wear a shrine maiden outfit to a place like this, but I have grown so accustomed to wearing it, it feels strange not to. Which part of it should I take off first...?
Huh, did you think I was a pure and innocent shrine maiden? Sorry to disappoint you, but if that were the case, I would hardly be here in the first place, wouldn't I?
Thinking about it, can I really consider myself a shrine maiden after being away from the shrine for so long?

I forgot my gloves
lost in the moment's spirit.
Silly Mitama.
Being a medic, I'm not supposed to engage in combat. Still, things never go according to plan in a battle, so I appreciate the extra protection.
In any case, I'll take the whole dress off. It's just one piece, after all.
I tend to spend most of my time alone, just writing. Still, there are things best done in company, don't you think?
Let's just slide these off, and...
I think I'll start with my capelet. It helps keep my shoulders warm in winter, but it's probably my most disposable piece of clothing.
To be honest, I doubt I would have come to a place like this had I never left the shrine. I was... secluded, in more ways than one.
Phew! I think I tied my armor a bit too tight this morning. Taking it off was a relief!
There are also some things you can only do with another person...
Nor am I a maiden anymore, for that matter...
The underwear I usually wear is more conservative than this. A special occasion calls for a special outfit, after all.

I apologize
but my bra must stay for now...
till I lose again.
This is it. All of me, revealed in front of you. Feeling aroused already?
Fortune is fickle, ~name~. Hardly something that can be relied on.
Your turn, ~name~. Better make it memorable.
Go ahead, ~name~, show us what you are made of.
No pressure, but I will judge you based on what you end up choosing, ~name~...

Although you tried hard,
fate dictates it was your turn
It could not be helped.
The stage is all yours. How will you charm us, I wonder?
Surely a brave man like you won't miss the chance to show what he's worth to all of us, hmm...?
If you have an item that you just hate wearing, now you have a chance to get rid of it...
For a winner to exist, there must be a loser, too... such cruelty is inherent to life itself.
What's wrong, ~name~? Cold feet at this point in the game?
If you are unsure of what you should take off, I could make a couple of suggestions...
Victory may be fleeting, but it certainly is sweet.

Much like the seasons
so this game turns; now show us
how well you adapt.

Let go of your pride:
in this luck-driven contest
it's just a burden.
Hah... please be the underwear...
Since it's your fault I'm in this state... don't you think you should take responsibility, ~name~?
M-more... I want to capture every inch of your body...
Come on, ~name~. Surely you didn't expect to keep all your clothing until the end, did you?
You have been pretty lucky so far, but all must come to an end, ~name~.

It's your turn to strip;
out of your many garments,
which one will you pick?
You're on, ~name~; time to make this game a bit more exciting.

Bad fortune for you
time to take the center stage
and take something off.

Regardless of skill
you find yourself the loser.
Blame fate if you must.

Sympathy from me
you won't find; fate forsook you:
now you pay the toll.
I'm more used to giving offerings than to receiving them, so this makes for a nice change.

Nothing is promised
whether victory or loss
all is down to chance.
I skipped nap time for this, ~name~. Better make it worth it.

Your brave sacrifice
won't be lost; in a myriad
poems it will live.

Sometimes you vanquish
sometimes you find yourself quelled
luck drifts just like that.

You made a misstep
Is it that I have made you
distracted, perhaps?
I have already taken off quite a bit, don't you think? Now it's your turn.

Whatever you take
whichever way you take it
your loss is our gain.

Victory is sweet
yet sweeter is the pleasure
from seeing you strip.

Your options dwindling
another choice must be made:
what will it be now?

Balk not, for there is
worth in the unfamiliar:
step forth, stalwart scout.

Your loss is a chance
to become a muse for me:
you should be grateful.
I'm taking notes on what you choose. With that in mind, try to pick something interesting, please.
If I were you, I'd already know what to strip next. Surely it can't be that hard to choose?
Well, someone had to strip this round. The fact that you had the worst hand, ~name~, was purely coincidental.
I would appreciate it if you put on a bit on a show, seeing the state I'm currently in...
Ah...~name~ will...

Much like dry kindling
flame could quickly possess me
with all but a spark...

Walk another step
forward into indulgence
and end just like me...
Play nice, ~name~, and maybe I'll repay your kindness, should you find yourself in the same predicament as I do.

A tie? No one strips.
Did this round even happen?
Yet we shall move on.
A decent starting point. After all, it would hardly be becoming to show your genitals after your first loss.
Accessories are more commonly associated with women, aren't they? Still, men do wear some small things, too.
Only your ~clothing~, ~name~? Daring today, aren't we?
Go on, ~name~. I'm most definitely paying attention.
You should know that your temporary surplus of luck won't protect you indefinitely, ~name~.
Really,~name~?
I suppose I can't fault you too much if you have been overly favored by luck today. Still, it is frustrating...

A pointless piece, he
strips: no pity for naked,
ill-starred Mitama?

Fate, cruel mistress
who toys with our ambitions
and makes us all fools.

Congratulations
to the best poker player;
the most boring, too.
Well, it's something... Even if it is barely visible, and won't make much of a difference.
With that out of the way, let's move on to something that will hopefully be more interesting.
~clothing.ifPlural(Were|Was)~ your ~clothing~ something you usually wore? I chose my usual attire, but maybe you wanted to dress up for the occasion.

Nothing substantial,
I'd rather be in my bed...
better luck next time.
The beauty of wild animals needs no adornment or accessory... Maybe you should seek to imitate it, ~name~.
Even if it's boring, it had to go off at some point... Better sooner than later.
I'm not usually an optimist, but I'm sure than the next round will be more exciting than this one.
I shall await your next loss, ~name~. Maybe you'll strip something meaningful, then.
Better focus on someone else that's more interesting...
If nothing else, you can find comfort in the fact that you are the luckiest person in this table.
At this rate, I'm going to fall asleep...
The downside of a game this crowded is how long it takes to become interesting... I'd rather have a quick and decisive match.
Well, it makes sense to go for that. It is still early, after all.
An accessory? Maybe I should have picked something from the accessory shop, myself. I think the pink beret would be a good fit.
We have a shop dedicated exclusively to accessories, back at the base. It's pretty popular, considering it's competing with an armory and a general shop.
Well, even if watching you strip your ~clothing~ isn't the most exciting thing, it still manages to be better than attending yet another war council.
Nothing ventured, nothing gained. Perhaps Father was more right than I originally thought.
Alas, some dawdling is inevitable, I suppose...
Have I fallen behind a bit? No matter, I can still recover.
You can only stall for so long, ~name~...
Well, I guess you had to get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ out at some point.

Tactical approach,
yet no matter how you play
soon you'll lose again.
Congratulations, ~name~. You have managed to make strip poker boring.
Maybe I should have offered dinner first?
Go ahead, ~name~. Flaunt your magnificent poker expertise! Regale us with your preeminence! Truly, I am in awe.
Come on, I'm trying to- Eh, no matter. I shall seek inspiration elsewhere.
That's... you still had something like that? How untimely...
Patience is a virtue I lack. If nothing else, you have just provided me with a chance to practice a bit.
Hmmm... If the game goes on like this, I might end up falling asleep...
Well, I can take this chance to write down some of the poems I've come up with...

Just a small trinket
a brighter future will come;
I can only hope.

It might not be much
yet all clothes count as the same
regardless of type.

While trinkets are nice,
paper and brush, all I need,
not accessories.
Sure, your ~clothing~ might have been the obvious choice, but imagine the look on our faces if you had gone for your underwear instead.

Meaningless bauble
in just a couple of rounds
will be forgotten.
Are we done yet? Remind me when the next round arrives, won't you?
You could do better than that, ~name~... but I suppose I can't fault you too much.
You still have a long way to catch up, ~name~... hurry up so you can lose some more.
You are going to have to try a little harder than that if you want to get a reaction out of me, ~name~.
Boredom isn't the kind of emotion usually associated with poker. In that regard, you are truly innovative, ~name~.
Maybe it would be a bit hypocritical to criticize you for going slow, considering my former choices... in my defense, this is just what I normally wear.

Fate, my nemesis
selfish bestower of gifts
how you toy with me.
Just because it was the correct move, doesn't mean it was the right one...
Isn't it funny how fortune can be so biased sometimes?
Even if it's not much, your ~clothing~ should provide some distraction, at the very least.
What, did you expect me to melt at the sight of your ~clothing~ being stripped? You'll have to try a bit harder for that.
Even this much is far more skin that I'd ever seen, back at the shrine. Maybe it's a good thing that I left...
Now we are getting somewhere. Not very far, mind you, but somewhere.

The shrine I grew up was attended by female shrine maidens exclusively. It wasn't until I joined the army that I had a chance to look at men so closely. Even something like your ~clothing~ would have been a novelty, back then.
Your ~clothing~? At this point? Eh...
Well, it doesn't hurt to get you less dressed, but at this point, you have fierce competition...
Now that ~name~'s ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone, let's move onto the next round.
Haiku poems usually have a thematic based in nature, but I have already written those in abundance. Coming here is also a chance to expand my repertoire, so to speak.
And now your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone. I'm much more attached to my writing implements than to my clothes, personally.
So many different clothing styles, congregated in one single place... It's actually pretty interesting.
I'm halfway tempted to take a nap for a bit...
Well, at least you didn't somehow end up with more clothing. Now that would be devastating.
Don't worry too much, it's only one loss. Unless you happen to lose again next round...
Even if it's not much on the grand scheme of things, it's worth it considering how much I had to work for it. That is, nothing at all.

Under the dim light
the gazes are fixed on her
yet steadfast, she strips.
It's not that your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ boring, it's that it's just...not enough.
Do you find yourself defined by your clothing, ~name~? I tend to think of myself as a poet first and foremost, despite my usual attire.

Not just what is stripped
the way in which it's taken
already tells much.
Haiku poems are designed to be straightforward; their small extensions means there's no room for divagation. Still, it's nice to take it slow sometimes, I guess.
No! Your ~clothing~? How will you ever recover from such a loss?
Hmm... maybe there is some merit to the concept of taking it slow.
If this is how you mean to entice me, I shudder to think what you would do if you intended to antagonize me.

Against my bare self
she stands, almost fully dressed:
isn't it a shame?
Well, I might not have much in the way of titillation yet, but at least I have some new haiku material.

Little by little,
the losses keep piling on,
closer to the end.
And I didn't even need to toil for it.
Wait, that's it? I had hoped for something more...
Huh. I was not aware I had been defeated in such a thorough fashion.
Well, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ gone now. Are you more or less comfortable, I wonder?

Nuder and nuder
your inevitable end
will soon come about.
Perhaps I should gather all the material I have written today and publish it in the form of an anthology. Does ''The seasons of strip poker'' sound good, as a prospective name?
Now this is what the game is all about.
Oh, my! Your ~clothing~, this early? I suppose I shall acquiesce to the designs of fate this time.
This was much quicker than a date. Much cheaper, too.
I have never seen the point of concealing one's feelings, especially on a place like this. You look very attractive, ~name~.
Hm... Not bad, not bad at all...
Do it slowly... so that we can really see you...
Come on, ~name~... no need to be shy. Let your body speak for itself.
The less a man wears, the more attractive he usually is. In that regard, you are doing an excellent job, ~name~.
Feeling lighter, ~name~? With the way things are going, you won't feel the burden of your clothing for much longer.
Next time you might end up taking even more, hmm...
Now your ~clothing~ can't protect you anymore.
The male form is not something I have much experience with. Good thing ~name~ is here to serve as an example.
I can assure you, this suits you far more than your starting attire.
Heh... more rounds like that and I won't be able to contain myself...
Now we are getting somewhere. By somewhere, I mean you naked on the floor, masturbating for us.
This is a turning point... not many more small things to hide with.
Hmm... even if I am out of the game, I appreciate the opportunity to be a spectator, at the very least.
Starting strong, aren't we? That certainly left an impression!
I wasn't aware I was so talented at cards. Well, in this case I think the correct word is ''lucky'', rather than ''talented''...
Well, if you want to take your ~clothing~ off, who am I to stop you?
If you think about it, everybody is born naked; you are merely returning to your natural state. Hmm... that sounds like something Father would say.

No mere pure haijin:
reborn into a card shark
I shall take a bite.

Flaunt what you possess,
as if baring your sheer soul
free for all to see.

An enchanting sight
possessing beauty such that
I can't help lauding.
Hmm... no more room for subtle gestures, I see.

Slowly but surely
your body is shown to us
what a rousing sight.
Not much to hide, hmm? That's perfectly alright; the view is better this way.

A fair offering
stirs the heart and warms the soul
at the right moment.
The human body is meant to be celebrated, whether in song, in poems... or simply by silently gazing and admiring every aspect of it.
Your body, your words, your expression... all of it makes excellent inspiration, ~name~.
Now ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ hid a lot, didn't they? Good thing they are out of the way now.
I'm not big on small talk. Nudity, however...
My, this game is truly moving fast, isn't it?

Major victory
but the best is yet to come
when you bare it all.
I guess I'll have to wait just a bit longer for you to lose it all...

What you used to have
is lost to time, now become
just a memory.
A couple more losses, and you will return to your natural state...
If you aren't careful, ~name~, you may end up like me...
Having lost it all, I lost the fear of losing alongside it. Now all I have left is watching you...
This much is not something new to me; soldiers often train or spar bare-chested, after all. Still, it will be nice to see.
I can certainly appreciate a man willing to take the initiative, ~name~.

What had stayed hidden
will now be forced to be free
as will the crowd's lust.

A man's chest is art
every inch, a monument;
soon laid bare for us.
It's funny how libido can be triggered by just a glimpse of what is desired, isn't it?
Come on, ~name~; it's about time you showed your chest to us, don't you think?
Have I not toiled enough? Now it's time for the prize...
It's about time you showed a bit more, don't you think?

I have shown plenty
now it's your fortune to be
the one who shows off.

A soft, rounded chest
would make for a nice pillow
for a good night's rest.
You've worked hard for that body, huh? I may not enjoy exercising myself, but I certainly admire the bodies of those who do.

A sculpted body
pinnacle of discipline
and trigger of lust.

A man's sheer, bare chest
needs no adornment; its pull
is a raw impulse.
What I seek in another person is comparability, more so than appearance. Still, there's no point in denying the pull of aesthetics- and yours is pretty strong, ~name~.

It's a step forward
yet be careful not to trip
for I lie in wait...
How I wish I could lie on it... feel its heat, and your heartbeat under it.
Hold on, already? I mean, this is what I wanted, but... it seems a bit premature.
I have seen such things before, of course. Admittedly, only in the form of pictures, but those don't differ much from the real thing, do they?
I'm more familiar with the female form; seeing a man fully naked for the first time will surely be a learning experience.

Two men; side to side
clad in nothing; all revealed:
how will they compare?
You too, ~name~? Maybe this really is my lucky day...
F-finally... I had to wait a long time for it... but at just the right moment...

The moment of truth:
what was hidden all along
shall soon be revealed.
O-oh, don't worry. I'll be sure to give it my fullattention...
My healing doesn't require other to take their clothes off... so I am really curious about this.
Oh, that looks really nice... I'd say I could wrap my whole hand around it...
O-oh... It's so... enthralling. I don't understand...
Hm... the male figure... it definitely has an allure all of its own...
Imagine all the things I could do to it, ~name~...
Perhaps it looks small in comparison to the other, but that just makes it more enticing...
A bit smaller, hm... Still, I like what I see, ~name~.

If size is what counts
I'm afraid you find yourself
vastly outperformed.
But maybe you can make up for it in another way?
You seem to be about the same size... maybe I could handle both of you at the same time...
One more loss and you are out, ~name~. Feeling the pressure yet?

An early success
is no problem; it just means
more time to admire.

My gaze is settled;
I can't avert my eyes now,
paralyzed by lust.
F-finally, at just the right moment... my wish comes true.
Now yours looks more... reasonably sized. Tempting, even...
Hm... not quite as big, ~name~? It's alright... I'm not sure which I like more, actually.
Oh, you two match! Perhaps a more direct comparison would be in order...

One small, one bigger
why pick only one, when I
could just try them both?

Exposed, you endure;
your last line of defense gone
naught but your bare soul.
O-oh... are you excited too, ~name~? I know I am...
I didn't know they could be so big...
O-oh, that's... mesmerizing...
Oh, my! They can differ that much in size? I was not aware every member could be so unique...

Having been blessed
an even bigger trophy
lies in front of me.
O-oh... are all of them... so big?
Heh... now that looks more like a reasonable size. Still big, but not as... well, not as threatening.
(Now that I have seen it... I can't help but wonder how would it feel...)
O-oh my word! Is... is it real? It's a-almost bigger than your arm! H-how did you even manage to hide such a thing in the first place?!

Is... is every penis as big as yours, ~name~?
The truth escaped me
having averted my eyes
yet is now blatant...
I can't even begin to describe it! All my vocabulary seems to have evaporated, except for the word ''big'' and its synonyms...
W-wait, is it really supposed to go inside? Inside of me? That seems... a scary proposal.

This is a hidden line whose purpose is to record the fact that Mitama has seen a penis. If Mitama has already seen a penis, she will compare the newly revealed penis with the first one she has seen. I hope it works.
Time to see if what you have is as good as your attitude has lead us to believe...
Oh? I wasn't expecting it this early, but if such is fate's design...
I would feel sorry for you, but since seeing each other is the purpose of the game, I think I'll just enjoy the view.
Come on, ~name~, give us what we want...
I can certainly appreciate the beauty of the female body. Remind me why, ~name~...

At last, your turn comes
abandoning all restraint
show us what you have.

Lucky me will have
a fair chance to gaze upon
your gorgeous twin peaks.
One piece less; one step closer to me; one more chance to gaze at you.
They look very good... I can't wait to see the rest of you...
I can assure you, ~name~, your body is very much fine as it is. In fact, some people might even find it more attractive than one like mine.
Don't be so harsh on yourself, ~name~. It might be hypocritical for me to say it, but there's nothing written in matters related to aesthetics.
Sometimes I wonder how my life would be if my breasts were smaller... Eh, I suppose the grass is always greener on the other side.

Cast aside your doubts:
size is not the flower's worth;
bask in what you own.

Don't be mistaken;
breasts are always a fine sight
whether big or small.
Small as they might be, they do a great job at attracting attention... I can't seem to avert my eyes from them.

A warm fire below,
almost a will of its own...
Do you feel it, too?

I could praise them, yet
actions speak louder than words:
if I was allowed...
Already, hmm...? Lucky me, then.
They might not be quite as big as mine, but I certainly wouldn't mind a closer look...
It is said that the early bird catches the worm... you certainly have caught my attention, ~name~.

No need to be shy
you have shown yourself to be
more than a handful.
The female figure is certainly a very interesting source of inspiration... yours is no exception, ~name~.

Think you don't measure?
Variety is life's spice
all kinds have lovers.
I'm afraid I can't see them that well from the ground... maybe you could get a bit closer?
I think I can see why you were so eager to show off...
I know mine are great, but you are no slouch either, ~name~...
Hmm... perhaps we could compare sizes... or maybe we could see which feel better...
There is much more to breasts than just their size, you know? Their weight, their touch, the pleasure you get when you rub them...
Huh... suddenly, I feel somewhat overdressed... and hot.
Maybe I do wear too many clothes...
A couple of rounds more, and I'll find myself in the same predicament...
Hmm... I think it's the first time I see someone more endowed than me... now I am curious as to how they'd feel.
Fortune is not with you today, ~name~. Yet it is fickle; maybe you can come back.
Showing off this soon? Lucky me...

Your deepest secret
laid bare, facing our gazes...
excitement or fright?

Showing your body,
abandon your reluctance
and give us a show.
Strange, isn't it? I have a good idea of what I am about to see, yet I can't help but find the prospect exciting.
Don't worry, ~name~... I'll make sure not to miss a single detail...
And there it is, your most intimate part, exposed for all of us to see... Who knows, maybe you'll get luckier from now on?

Whether you flaunt it
or attempt to conceal it,
your excitement shows.

On a spring morning
I saw a flower; and dew
covered its petals...

Warm and inviting;
I truly wish I could rest
my mouth on your lips.
Don't you wish to follow my steps, ~name~? There's plenty of pleasure awaiting you...

A strange contraption
which I never saw before;
yet a player, too...
Hm... that is a strange artifact. I wonder how it-
Strange... I didn't expect to meet a fellow cleric in a place like this. Are you here to partake of the forbidden fruit, too?
Wait... don't tell me you are going to do it again? I can only hope nobody gets hurt...
Oh, who... oh. It's that gun fiend's turn again, isn't it?

Little raven, why
did you abandon your nest?
There's no coin to earn...
The brigands we face are usually foul-smelling brutes. If nothing else, it's nice to see you break that stereotype.
Wait, is it time for your reveal already? But you still have clothes left, so if it's not the forfeit...
Are those eye bags under your eyes? Sleep is paramount, you know...
Where do you get all that energy from, Kora? Just looking at you is exhausting...
I was curious: what does your job entail, exactly? Being a grunt doesn't sound like a glamorous job...
I could never subject myself to the chains of royalty. Ruling an entire country sounds terribly time-consuming, not to mention tedious...
Are you here to overcome your shyness, ~name~? I can assure you, there is nothing to be afraid of.
Don't worry too much, ~name~- you are just starting.
Sometimes the first step is the hardest to take, isn't it?

Your rough demeanor
fits better the battlefield
than a friendly game.
We do want to see you naked, ~name~... are you going to refuse our request?

Locked all day inside
writing for eternity
doesn't sound so bad...
Alas, if only I didn't have an endless stream of duties to attend to...
I wouldn't get too worked up about this game; after all, we don't know each other, and we will probably never see each other again.
Yes, this is part of the game too. Much more interesting that the card-playing part, if you ask me.
Afraid of ending up in my situation, ~name~? I assure you, by the time you are, you'll yearn for it.
A bit shy, aren't we? Well, it was my turn already; now it's yours.
Oh, it's ~name~'s turn... again. You shouldn't try to hog all the attention, it is unbecoming.
You do know that most of us will be naked at the end of the game, don't you? I assure you, there's no need to rush frantically.
Your body may be alluring, but your pacing leaves something to be desired.

Is this purple room
not auspicious towards you?
Regardless, you lost.

Not much for talking?
Actions are louder than words,
so show what you got.
Oh, ~name~, I would very much like to see more of you... and more than just seeing, too.
Ugh... fine, if you really think puns would help lighten the atmosphere... wait, that one was unintentional!
Oh, no... the only thing worse than a pun is a forced one. It's okay, really, there is no need to continue!
On a fair world, I would be the one who lost, instead of ~name~. Still, if it's just cards...

It would seem you lost:
All is fair in love and war
the proverb says so.

Though you tried to flee
your reckoning approaches
as it does for all.

The strong falls at last,
like a dream in a spring night
dust before the wind.
I suspect you may be under some sort of curse. Now that you know, you should remove it posthaste... after the game ends, of course.
Are you actually unlucky, or just really desperate to strip? Either way, I shall not complain.

Rejoice at your loss:
for to succeed at failure
is no modest feat.

You again? This game
can certainly be cruel!
More power to me.

Struggle all you want
everything pales to the might
of a Royal Flush.

No room for concern
my victory was assured;
majesty trumps all.
Well, let me get comfortable and- wait, I'm not the loser? Huh, I almost wanted to start...
Oh, I almost thought it would be my turn to...
I did mention that I attract miracles, didn't I?

Overwhelming might
my opponents fall like flies
but only this round...

To escape a bear;
to avoid loss, all you need
is not coming last.

Reminder to self:
always keep your highest card
it might come in hand.

Fate decreed your loss
yet there's room for you to choose:
what will you discard?
Oh, staves always run out at the worst possible moment, don't they? At least we weren't in the middle of a battle...

What is its purpose?
A marble throne for a king?
It shines like a gem...
A- a projectile weapon?! Why did you do that?
Well, if you do end up getting hurt, hopefully you will learn how bad of an idea this is... assuming you survive.
You may be aiming for your clothes, but you are blowing up my own ears with all the noise...

A threat to our lives,
an assault on our eardrums;
what is not to like?
Wha... T-that's- I mean-T-those are real penises?

What gorgeous display
is your bare body next to
your slightly red cheeks.
Ooh, those are pretty, but pretty impractical, too. I'd rather wear something comfortable; it would hardly be convenient to break an ankle on the battlefield.

What a spectacle!
Your clothes, lying in tatters.
But won't you need those?
There's no need to take out your anger on your clothes, you know...
Huh... I must admit, I have grown too attached to my clothes to destroy them in a fit of anger...
Lately, there has been somewhat of a trend of wearing glasses, back at the base. Purely cosmetic, but they do make you appear smarter.
Your glasses? I hope you didn't need them to see. Otherwise you won't get to see me anymore...
You didn't have to take everything off, you know? I'm pretty sure you could have kept your glasses...
Some people can be really adverse to wearing shoes. My mother, for example; I don't think I have ever seen her wearing them.

Stripping your clothing
under a fully blue sky
a summer day's joy.

An undressed body
pearls of sweat on its surface
the water beckons.
Although, personally, I am more fond of rods than staves. I'd rather keep my distance, thank you very much.

A genius maker
must have bestowed life on it
to achieve speech, too...
Yes, yes, very funny. You have shown off plenty, and luckily nobody was hurt as a result. Now let's not do that again, yes?
Wait... if she doesn't have clothes anymore, she can't use that gun of hers anymore! Yes! I survived strip poker against her!
Oh, uh... After the initial surprise, the juxtaposition of both male and female part is almost hypnotic... (Maybe if I asked Rhajat, she could...)

Fret not, Misato:
battle scar; warrior's proof;
it just adds to you.
Well, this I will have to admit, Aimee: your body is enticing... even if nothing else is.
I have seen warriors being intimately familiar with their weapons, but you take it literally, Aimee...
Hmm... I'm more used to sitting on a cushion, but perhaps a chair has its own advantages...
I wasn't aware you could use a chair for your time of relief. This establishment doesn't spare any expenses, that's for sure.

From your vantage point
you observe us from above
with no details missed.
Can't say I am a big fan of using toys for masturbation. Normally, it is enough to use my own fingers... or someone else's...

For all your bluster,
you ended shamed on the floor,
defeated by me...
Somehow, I don't think ~name~ can hear us anymore...

Possessed, frenzied, raw
no longer in control, just
unbridled, pure lust.
I bet ~name~ would cum with just the slightest touch...

Lost to all but lust
seeking nothing but pleasure
the grind almost done.

All things considered
after loudly risking lives
you got off easy.
Wait, already? Are you sure you don't have anything else? No last-moment surprises?
This is a bit... premature, don't you think? U-um, not that I'm complaining...

No more room for stall;
your defeat is now complete:
I'll enjoy the spoils.
The game might be over for you, but you are just getting started...

Resisting so long
is it truly a forfeit
to follow your lust?

How joyous to see
the former high and mighty
down to my level.
You have already seen me masturbate for you. It's only fair I watch you do the same, isn't it?
Hmm... keep me company, won't you?
Join me, ~name~... The more, the merrier, don't you think?
Something tells me that concentrating on the cards will be a bit more difficult from now on...
I must admit, I am more than curious to see your performance, ~name~.
The moment of truth... I have long fantasized about it, but I hope you surpass my expectations.
~Name~, I'll be watching your every move...
Every time my eyes fall on it, it seems to have grown larger...
Are my bare shoulders enticing you, perhaps? Truly scandalous, I know.
You certainly were in a hurry, ~name~... Are you having fun, at least?

~Name~ is deep in thought, isn't he? I wonder what
deep dark fantasies are going through his mind right now...
If you had waited a bit longer, I could have been a better target of your attention, ~name~...
If you keep this pace, you'll finish before I have even taken off my shoes.
So that's what a man likes... I'll make sure to play close attention.
The descriptions I have read aren't even close to the real thing...
My... such vigorous handling... it's almost violent!

A raging fire
blazes before me; perhaps
I will get consumed...
I can't help but stare... it is a mesmerizing performance.
You certainly aren't the type of man to get cowed by an audience, ~name~.
So forceful... you have really gotten into it, haven't you?
True love isn't something that can spark from a chance encounter, or without a deep, intimate knowledge of the beloved person. But you have certainly inflamed my lust, ~name~.
My! This is much different from how Nina describes it on- uh, never mind that...
Both us are naked, engaged in self-pleasure... So close, and yet so far...
Tell me, ~name~. Does your heartbeat race like mine?
It might not be a race, yet facing you is making me go a bit faster...
Already done? Well, someone was eager...
And to think I have barely started to strip myself.

Laid low by luck's whims,
you lay there satisfied, but
thoroughly vanquished.
Oh, what a climax! Just at the right moment...
You couldn't hold it a bit more? Then we could have finished -hah- together...
Wow, that was a lot... You really surpassed my expectations, ~name~!
Maybe the next time, instead of spilling your seed over yourself, you could share it with me...
According to the rules of the game, we both lost... Still, you'll agree with me that it was the sweetest loss of your life, no?
Don't get cold feet now, ~target~... I want to see you in action.
You don't need to pretend you don't want to do this, ~name~. It's only natural, after all.
Don't fret, ~name~. After all, most of us will end up in the same situation as you, in the end.
Defeated so thoroughly by a mere shrine maiden? My, my...
I see you were in dire need of self-care, ~name~...

You fought valiantly
yet you were defeated still;
relax and enjoy.

I will derive no pleasure from your loss, for I am above such trivial matters.
Your body, however...
Ah... you'll join me, ~name~? You're welcome to seek inspiration by gazing at me...

Having been bested
I see my foe fallen now
to my utter joy.
Sure, you might have lost, but there must be some part of you who wanted to do this, isn't there?
Well, if you were in such a hurry, don't let me stop you...
Go on, ~name~. Maybe I'll learn something new...
Ah... I am a bit ahead... but maybe you will be able to catch up, ~name~...

The end's beginning
is inevitably here
how fast will it come?
I can only hope you enjoy it half as much as I did.
Ever have sex with another woman before, ~name~? Maybe I could show you what it is like...
I hope that is as enjoyable as it looks, ~name~...
I can see why you were in such a hurry...
Strange punishment, this self-inflicted one...
Debasing yourself like that in front of a shrine maiden... have you no shame, ~name~?
I wonder, will you start slow, or seek release as soon as possible? I tend to the latter, but other people have their own preferences.
Ooh, you are really dedicated, huh? I still have some time before I join you... but you might be finished before I have the chance to do so.
Just out of curiosity, how deep can you go, ~name~?
I'm getting flushed... no point to deny it anymore, I am being taken by lust.
Perhaps I should imitate how you do it, ~name~... maybe I'll learn something new.
Strange... I didn't think I would find myself in this kind of situation... and yet, I find it pleasurable...
Feel free to look as much as you want, ~name~... I'll take the opportunity to do the same.
I can't help but feel a strange sense of kinship between you and me...
It's all over now... Just relax and focus on what pleasures you.
I might be done, but ~name~ is just getting started...
With how happy you seem, I am almost tempted to go for a repeat myself...

Like a volcano
warmer and warmer you get
until you erupt.
You get to masturbate while gazing upon my naked body... aren't you lucky, ~name~?
There is no wrong nor right way to do this, ~name~. Just do what feels good for you.
Huh, you were so quick, I almost missed it! Perhaps you should try again later, so that I won't miss anything...

Already finished?
I haven't even started;
yet somehow I feel...
The pitch your voice reached there was a poem by itself, ~name~...

Exhausted, you lay
after reaching the summit;
superb performance.
That look on your face... you really gave it your all, didn't you?

A piercing shout marks
the climax of the whole show:
the raw cry rings true.
Is it just me, or do you feel exhausted too after climaxing?
Heh... you beat me, ~name~... but not by much...
Hmm... you couldn't hold it even one more second, ~name~?
Me first? Very well, I shall set an example.

A plunge into bliss;
a profound stimulation,
I'll fully give in.
Luckily, I have my pillow, trusty companion, to call for aid. Let me get comfortable...
Oh, are you curious? Do you wish to gaze at myself? Perhaps you could even provide assistance...
What's with that gaze? Have you perhaps, discovered something new? Well, the more you know...

What am I to do?
Will I prolong this pleasure?
Or give in to bliss?
If I was at your complete mercy, what would you do to me, ~player~?
Isn't this what you wanted? To see a shrine maiden defile herself? To succumb to pleasure? To scream in ecstasy?
Usually, I do this in silence. However, since I am in company today, I'll put on a bit of a performance...
If I can get this excited by myself, imagine how you could make me feel, ~player~...
Normally, I use this pillow to take a nap wherever I wish. I will have to remember to clean it when I get back...
I tend to keep my haiku to myself. In a sense, this is the first time I am performing for others... so I hope you enjoy it.

Sitting by myself
I miss a companion's warmth:
my body wants yours.

Passion unleashes
a torrent of emotions;
I am swept away.
O-oh, f-fuck!
Haah... it seems words have left me...
Not... m-much longer...
I'm on the edge...
Hnrrgh...
I am making... such undignified noises... b-but I need it...
Y-yes, that's it! O-ooh!
Whew, what a rush! I'm starting to get slightly drowsy...
Heh... I always get tired after doing this... today was no exception...
I wonder if this counted as exercise... I did end up working a sweat, heehee.
Maybe I should I have tried to prolong it... but I always get so excited, I end up losing control...
Doing it in front of an audience... went pretty well, actually. I'll probably do it again sometime.
*yawn*... This game is taking such a long time... I think I'm going to take a quick nap...
I may have lost, but that was fun. Wait, if I had won, I wouldn't have been able to relieve myself, so maybe it was a good thing I didn't.
After the game, I'm locking in my room for a week. I have much to write about...
Normally, I would be taking a shower at this point. I suppose I will have to stay sticky a bit longer...
And to think I will have to return to the dull routine of training and chores after this...
Hmm... tomorrow, I'm on cooking duty. People always praise my meals, but I spend so much time making them when I could be writing instead...

Victory is mine!
But I barely broke a sweat...
What did just happen?

It went by so fast...
Is it over already?
But I have yet to...
Haiku GET
O-oh, the game is over? Oh, uh, congratulations, ~winner~...
Haiku GET
Zzzzzzzz...
Zzz...zzz...
Zzz...*snore* zzz...

Lying down, I watch...
today's clouds slide to the right...
I truly am free...
